raw_result.Analysis Notes: All seven search results pertain to various types of support offered by South Holland District Council. However, only five links directly reference free school meals or eligible families for free school meals, which are the most direct matches for the customer's needs.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The links with the highest confidence scores provide more specific and actionable information, such as application forms or mention of support funded by free school meals.
